Here is the 10 player combo that will ruin anything to ever happen anywhere:

=Your team=

2 Angry Russian Friends - maximum salt, no kick avalible
1 Griefer - +left
1 Bad Wallhacker - no win for the team, no xp for you
1 You - Already a disappointment no more to say

=Enemy team=

1 Obvious Aimhacker - those are really fun
1 Smurf - Basically unbanable aimbotter
1 Obvious Wallhacker - try peeking those corners
1 normaaa....... DiD He JusT ToGGle SpINboT?! - have fun
1 Good at game friend - will you pick the gg or the ez?

7/10 We can't handle hackers so let's make the game free
-Valve (The most reasonable company)
